list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have an idea or impression of the existence, presence, or truth of (something) without certain proof.
doubt the genuineness or truth of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a broker whose honesty he had no reason to suspect
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nhà môi giới có sự trung thực mà anh ta không có lý do để nghi ngờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person thought to be guilty of a crime or offense.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the police have arrested a suspect
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đã bắt giữ một nghi phạm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: not to be relied on or trusted; possibly dangerous or false.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a suspect package was found on the platform
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một gói nghi ngờ đã được tìm thấy trên nền tảng
